Klaszterelemz√©s:
```{r}
dataToCluster <- read.csv("dataToCluster.csv", row.names = 1)

dists <- dist(dataToCluster)
clustered <- hcut(dists, k = 10, method = "ward.D2")

clusterPlot <- fviz_cluster(clustered, data = dists)

print(clusterPlot)
                  
dendrogram <- fviz_dend(clustered, height = 200, cex = 0.5, ggtheme = theme_minimal(), lower_rect = 100, horiz = TRUE, main = "", ylab = "")

print(dendrogram)

ggsave("clusterAnalysis.png", dendrogram, device = png())

```
